definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
service (work done for money)/services (as in "goods and services")

sentences.english: Icicles hang from a roof in Lofer, Austrian province of Salzburg.
sentences.chinese: 在奧地利薩爾茨堡的勞弗爾，冰柱掛在屋頂上。

sentences.english: Matt is a Chemical Engineering at Laurentian University.
sentences.chinese: 馬特是在勞倫琴大學化學工程。

sentences.english: Day didn't drop in my case, so bitter I mind, labor I bones and muscles.
sentences.chinese: 天沒降大任於我，照樣苦我心智，勞我筋骨。

sentences.english: The heart of overwork, and clumsy, you forgive him.
sentences.chinese: 心之過勞，人便笨拙，你原諒他吧。

sentences.english: My brother-in-law said loudly, to bother you.
sentences.chinese: 高聲說我的小舅子，勞你費心了。

sentences.english: A half-hour later I'm back in the office, I tell Lloyd the whole story.
sentences.chinese: 半小時後我回到辦公室，我把這事告訴勞伊德了。

sentences.english: The Lorentz symmetry of spacetime forms the core of relativity.
sentences.chinese: 時空的勞侖茲對稱是構成相對論的核心。

sentences.english: Family and friends give Claire credit for slowing Laurent down10.
sentences.chinese: 家人和朋友都夸克萊爾，說是她讓勞倫特消停下來的。

sentences.english: The Prince of Darkness does not condescend to such cheap drudgery.
sentences.chinese: 這種下賤的差使，根本用不着勞“黑暗之王”的大駕。

sentences.english: Dr Lo is a specialist in infectious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 勞永樂是感染及傳染病專科醫生。

sentences.english: Messrs. Fuld and Lowitt declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 福爾德和勞伊特均拒絕置評。

sentences.english: Lloyd Blankfein and his accusers have at least one thing in common .
sentences.chinese: 勞爾德貝蘭克梵和起訴他的那些人至少有一個共同點。

sentences.english: Mr Rawlinson, however, defended the industry and the game.
sentences.chinese: 然而，勞林森先生爲這款遊戲和遊戲產業進行了辯護。

sentences.english: "Monsieur," said he, "where is the court-house, if you please."
sentences.chinese: “先生，”他說，“勞您駕，法院在什麼地方？”

sentences.english: Those deposits had placed the origin of ants in Laurasia.
sentences.chinese: 以前那些沉積物將螞蟻的起源定位在勞拉古陸。

sentences.english: In this paper the author expounds a asymptotic characteristic of the mean-value in the generalized Taylor formula.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了廣義臺勞公式中所取中值的一個漸進性質。

definition: to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
